mapper.select: select * from food_restaurant where address like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') or catename like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') or placename like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
select count(*) from food_restaurant where address like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') or catename like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') or placename like CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from food_restaurant where address like CONCAT ('%',#{address},'%') and not mainphotourl is null ORDER BY rating desc limit 5
select * from food_restaurant where catename like CONCAT ('%',#{address},'%') and not mainphotourl is null ORDER BY rating desc limit 10
select * from food_restaurant where not mainphotourl is null ORDER BY rating desc limit 6
select * from food_restaurant where not mainphotourl is null ORDER BY views desc limit 6
select * from food_restaurant where not mainphotourl is null ORDER BY reviewcount desc limit 6
mapper.insert:
insert into food_restaurant_review (cid, rw_writer, rw_content, rw_photo, rw_rating, userid) values (#{cid}, #{rw_writer}, #{rw_content}, #{rw_photo}, #{rw_rating}, #{userid})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into food_restaurant (cid, address, catename, parking, placename, phonenum, mainphotourl) values (#{cid}, #{address}, #{catename}, #{parking}, #{placename}, #{phonenum}, #{mainphotourl}) on duplicate key update cid =cid
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into food_restaurant_openHour (cid, openhourDisplayText, periodName, timeName, timeSE, dayOfWeek) value (#{cid}, #{openhourDisplayText}, #{periodName}, #{timeName}, #{timeSE}, #{dayOfWeek}) on duplicate key update cid =cid
insert into food_restaurant_off (cid, holydayName, offdate) value (#{cid}, #{holydayName}, #{offdate}) on duplicate key update cid =cid
insert into food_restaurant_menu (cid, menu, price) value (#{cid}, #{menu}, #{price}) on duplicate key update cid =cid
mapper.update: update food_restaurant set address = #{address}, catename = #{catename}, parking = #{parking}, placename = #{placename}, phonenum = #{phonenum}, mainphotourl = #{mainphotourl} where cid = #{cid}
update food_restaurant set reviewcount = reviewcount + 1 where cid = #{cid}
update food_restaurant set views= views + 1 where cid = #{cid}
update food_restaurant set rating =(select avg(rw_rating) from food_restaurant_review where cid = food_restaurant.cid);
